# sourceRGBBlendFactor

**Instance Property**

Configures the source RGB blend factor.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourceRGBBlendFactor: MTLBlendFactor { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property defaults to `MTLBlendFactorOne`.
title: sourceRGBBlendFactor
